name: PunishmentTracker
0:
”Alexa, open punishment tracker”
”Alexa, start punishment tracker”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: punishment tracker
des: I often set goals to motivate me and keep me accountable, but recently realized that options are endless. My daughter was put on an all electronic freeze punishment for lying. The punishment was for a month but as I get busy I forgot when it was due to end. This skill helped track it for me.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
